task.description: Complete the ts-sudoku-lib hints system implementation and fix compilation errors

issues.description: Method signature mismatch in test files - generateHints() and getBestHint() called with wrong number of parameters
issues.details: Tests call generateHints(state) but signature requires generateHints(puzzle, state)

issues.description: Function parameter type mismatch - createPuzzleAndState called with IPuzzleDescription instead of string[]
issues.details: createPuzzleAndState expects string[] but receives IPuzzleDescription from createTestPuzzle
Variables like 'puzzle' referenced but not defined in scope

correctSignatures.generateHints: generateHints(puzzle: Puzzle, state: PuzzleState, options?: IHintGenerationOptions): Result<readonly IHint[]>
correctSignatures.getBestHint: getBestHint(puzzle: Puzzle, state: PuzzleState, options?: IHintGenerationOptions): Result<IHint>
correctSignatures.createPuzzleAndState: createPuzzleAndState(rows: string[]): { puzzle: Puzzle; state: PuzzleState }

analysisResults.testPattern: Tests use testPuzzle and testState variables available in beforeEach scope
